content: craft a stunning scarf with just one 100-gram ball of #4 worsted weight yarn equivalent to 175-200 yards this delightful accessory measures approximately 5 wide and 44 long what sets this scarf apart is its eye-catching design resembling the corner-to-corner crochet technique yet it s meticulously crafted back and forth in row without any need for increasing or decreasing stitches the ingenious construction involves working within the chain spaces created in the previous row eliminating any guesswork about where to insert your crochet hook for those who desire a personalized touch adjusting the scarf s dimensions is a breeze simply increase your starting chain count by 4 stitches and use more or less yarn to achieve the desired size
